news.title: Plane tickets are getting cheaper as domestic travel demand weakens
news.summary: Airlines are trimming their domestic schedules as leisure traveler demand comes in lighter than expected. Airlines are cutting back on domestic flights to meet demand for leisure travelers.

news.title: Trump floats tougher Russia sanctions, meets Zelenskyy for first time since Oval Office blowup
news.summary: President Donald Trump's Truth Social post comes as he ramps up pressure on Russia and Ukraine to strike a deal to end their war. President Donald Trump: 'Russia and Ukraine need to come to an agreement to end the war'

news.title: Corporate sponsors are backing away from LGBTQ+ Pride organizations
news.summary: Companies that were once loud and proud in sponsoring LGBTQ+ community celebrations are pulling back their funds. It's an uncertain time for Pride organizations.

news.title: I've studied over 200 kids—and this is the most dangerous and 'overused' phrase in parenting
news.summary: Fight the temptation to say these two words, says child psychologist and parenting expert Reem Raouda. How do you comfort your child when they're upset?

news.title: Americans are getting flashbacks to 2008 as tariffs stoke recession fears
news.summary: 'It's the old poors teaching the new poors,' said one content creator. 'It's not a new world. It's a different world,' said another.

news.title: 5 charts that show how Trump’s first 100 days have shaped Americans’ finances
news.summary: Prices were relatively stable in Trump’s first months in office. Yet the stock market erased trillions in household wealth. Consumers are worried about the looming impact of tariffs.

news.title: Here’s how much money Shedeur Sanders lost out on by falling to the fifth round of the NFL draft
news.summary: Sanders was once projected to go as high as No. 1 overall. He went No. 3 overall to the New York Giants seemingly as low as he could go.

news.title: ‘I survived a head-on car wreck’: I’m on Medicaid, but inheriting $290K. How do I protect it from the 5-year look-back rule?
news.summary: “I have not worked since. I was put on 100% disability,” he says. “About 30 years ago, I survived a head-on car wreck.”

news.title: ‘I’m literally afraid to look at my balance’: I have $300K in a 2025 target-date fund. Is there a chance it will recover?
news.summary: “I have no idea at this point how much I have lost,” he says. “I’ve lost a lot. I’m in shock.”

news.title: ‘An argument ensued’: My mother entrusted my inheritance to her second husband. That’s when it all went horribly wrong.
news.summary: “He is a managing director at a major bank and probably clears $800,000 per annum,” says a source. “He’s probably clearing $800k per year.”
